amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $290 million and increase funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by a similar amount for use in upgrading or replacing infrastructure that Amtrak owns, along with the acquisition and maintenance of Amtrak's fleet of locomotives, passenger cars, and other equipment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for FAA Operations by $290 million and increase funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dold amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Dold.
